Sub: - 
Permission for Ramp to Ramp transfer of passengers lrom Intemational to
Domestic flight-reg.
Sir,
I am directed to convey the permission of Competent Authority for transfer of
Passengers from International Flights to Domestic Flight (in connection with the
evacuation of Indians from Coronavirus(Covid- I 9) affected countries to Quarantine
facilities in India) subject to proper screening of Passengers and baggage as per AVSEC
Circular No,l0/2016 and conigendum to AVSEC Circular no.34/2005 respectively.
Airport Operator will provide the necessary screening facilities as per AVSEC
Cir.no.23l2005 and CISF will follow the same screening SOPs as per above Circulan,
may be at Apron or any other Isolated area at Airside.
Yours faithfullv
